channel.title: winja on Winja
channel.description: Recent content in winja on Winja

item.title: Winja @ Wicked6 Cyber Games
item.description: Three talks, two interviews, and 1 CTF event was Winja’s contribution for Wicked6 Cyber Games - 2022 Women’s Globa Cyber League.

item.title: Winja @ Wicked6 Cyber Games
item.description: Three talks, two interviews, and 1 CTF event was Winja’s contribution for Wicked6 Cyber Games - 2022 Women’s Globa Cyber League.

item.title: Winja Unplugged | 26 February 2022
item.description: “What is Cyber Threat Intelligence” by Rishika Desai.

item.title: Winja Unplugged | 05 February 2022
item.description: “Introduction to Threat Modelling” by Siddhant Chouhan.

item.title: Winja Unplugged | 22 January 2022
item.description: “sqlmap: Dumb tool? Smart scans.” by Sanjay Das.

item.title: Winja Talks | 30 November 2021
item.description: “AI vs. Pandemic - The Fine Line Between Protecting Lives and Privacy Intrusion in the times of Global Pandemic” by Sneha Banerjee.

item.title: Winja CTF | c0c0n 2021
item.description: Winja organised Capture-the-Flag competition for all, women and men participants, at c0c0n 2021 security and hacking virtual conference.

item.title: Winja Talks | 09 September 2021
item.description: “So you want to get into Cybersecurity?” by Aditi Bhatnagar. This talk was focused on speaker’s journey into the field of cybersecurity.

item.title: Winja Talks | 26 August 2021
item.description: “Building Resilient Communities” by Shivani Singh. This talk was focused on creating communities that are robust, resilient, diverse and what goes behind building something like this.

item.title: Winja Meets CTF for GIRLS (CTF4G) | SECCON 2020
item.description: Representatives of Winja CTF (India) and CTF for GIRLS (Japan) communities had a conversation during SECCON 2020 conference.

item.title: Winja Talks | 03 October 2020
item.description: In this special edition of Winja Talks, we invited three diverse speakers. While two of the speakers have created challenges for our Winja CTF competitions in recent past, the third speaker belongs to a team that has won several Winja CTF competitions organised by us over the years.

item.title: Winja CTF | c0c0n XIII
item.description: Winja organised Capture-the-Flag competition for all, women and men participants, at c0c0n 2020 security and hacking virtual conference.

item.title: Winja Blogs | September 2020
item.description: We conducted a technical blog writing workshop for women participants.

item.title: Winja Talks | 22 August 2020
item.description: We invited women speakers to present technical talks on a topic of their choice.

item.title: Winja CTF | Nullcon Goa 2020
item.description: Capture-the-Flag competition was organised for women-only participants at Nullcon Goa 2020 security conferece.
